Changelog
=========

2.1.1 (2014-05-05)
------------------

* Added Sphinx documentation.


2.1.0 (2014-04-25)
------------------

* Python 3 support.
* Updated documentation.
* Unit tests and tox support added.

2.0.0 (2013-08-10)
------------------

* Merge of some code from ``gs.database``.
* Reduced dependency on Zope (now an extra requirement).

1.0.0 (2012-07-13)
------------------

* Initial version.
